episodes.title: Episode 29 Raised In A Cult , She was Abused And Suffered Severe PTSD with Lori Christensen
episodes.description: Lori was raised in a cult and severely abused, which she repressed until her late 30's when she started to have flashbacks and seizures. Now with her new medical condition (flashbacks and seizures) she had to continue to work because she was a single mother needing to raise her children. Doctors didn't know what to do to help her and in the process misdiagnosed and overmedicated her. Medical professionals told her that she was stuck and she continued to get worst. She was devasted with her medical prognosis. She started off with 2-3 jobs, raising her sons, buying her own home to losing it all. She later found out that she was struggling with PTSD. She struggled with PTSD for many years, but she found a way to heal herself and others. The advice she gives 1. Don't give up 2. You're going to find a way 3. You're not the only one, we're here for you 4. It's important to remember the spiritual aspect of your healing Contact information loricayechristensen@gmail.com Facebook Lori Christensen
